name: Avocado
description: Our Hass avocado is characterized by its exquisite taste and nutty aroma. It contains rich, intense yellow flesh and is uniform, smooth and spreadable in appearance and taste.

name: Strawberry
description: Aromatic strawberry halves for decoration and toppings: selected fruits, carefully picked and halved by hand. Ideal as a cake topping and for dessert variations, homemade jam.

name: Banana
description: Unlike the well-known common banana, the plantain is usually not consumed raw, but processed into various dishes. The taste of the raw plantain is floury and rather unpleasant.

name: Tometo
description: ORGANIC seed genuine and reproducible in Demeter quality. Salad tomato Rondobella has excellent tolerance to late blight and brown blight and is ideal for outdoor cultivation.

name: Red Onion
description: Onions are known to be rich in biotin. Most of the flavonoids, known as antioxidants, are found in the outer layers. Therefore, when peeling off the layers,little should be removed.

name: Capsicum
description: The best pepper plants for maximum yield. Peppers contain many healthy nutrients and are high in fiber and vitamin E. These plants provide fresh, juicy peppers.

name: Cabbage
description: White cabbage (regional) from Germany fresh & directly from the Hamburg wholesale market. The firm, green to whitish-green leaves form a round or pointed shape.

name: Broccoli
description: The best for you: broccoli of the highest quality with a natural and aromatic taste, cut by hand - you only get tender and flawless florets. Can be portioned as needed.

name: Potato
description: The Goldmarie is a potato from organic farming. It is a waxy potato with a smooth skin and an oval shape. The potato owes its name to the golden yellow color of the skin.
